sentences.sContent: One day a grasshopper came upon an ant at work in a garden.
sentences.sContent_eng: One day a grasshopper came upon an ant at work in a garden.
sentences.sCn: 一天， 蚱蜢碰到了一只正在花园里干活的蚂蚁。

sentences.sContent: I remember that it was summer. I had just come inside from catching grasshoppers and I was sorting them on my sister's bed because I didn't want to get grasshopper guts on mine.
sentences.sContent_eng: I remember that it was summer. I had just come inside from catching grasshoppers and I was sorting them on my sister's bed because I didn't want to get grasshopper guts on mine.
sentences.sCn: 我记得那是夏天，我抓了些蝗虫放到妹妹的床上，根据它们还剩下几只脚来归类，有些蝗虫的内脏都冒出来了，我当然不想弄到自己的床上。

synos.tran: 蚱蜢；[植保]蝗虫；小型侦察机

remMethod.val: grass(草地) + hopper(跳跃者) → 草地上的跳跃者 → 蚂蚱

trans.tranOther: an insect that has long back legs for jumping and that makes short loud noises
